footer.address: Via G. Turri, 12, 42121, Reggio Emilia (RE), Italy

common.error_header: {count, plural, =1 {An error occurred} other {# errors have occurred}}:

autoinput.guide: Enter at least {minSize, plural, =1 {a character} other {# characters}}

booking.title: Reservation
booking.coundown_clock: {hours, plural, =1 {# hour} other {# hours}}, {minutes, plural, =1 {# minute} other {# minutes}}, {seconds, plural, =1 {# second} other {# seconds}}

editing_locked_warning.title: Editing lock memo
editing_locked_warning.description: After {lockDate}, orders editing will be locked.

editing_locked.title: Editing locked
editing_locked.description: Since {lockDate} every form of booking editing is locked.

review_info.title: Review personal info
review_info.description: Conferm your membership personal info. This data is needed to release the new membership card and insurance.

exchange_invite_sent.title: Invite sent
exchange_invite_sent.description: You will both be contacted via email to confirm the exchange.

invite_group.title: Official group
invite_group.description: Enter the con's official group! <link></link> (furizon attendees, only)

messages.exchange_explaination: You can give away your reservation to another account via this dialogue. Once you've selected a recipient, you will both receive an email to confirm such exchange.
messages.reservation_qr: Show this QR code to a Furizon staffer when checking in.

SERVER_ERROR.title: Server error
SERVER_ERROR.description: Could not retrieve the current event info. Try again, later.

MEMBERSHIP_MULTIPLE_DONE.title: Multiple membership cards
MEMBERSHIP_MULTIPLE_DONE.description: It appears you have multiple membership cards active at the same time. Please contact the support for further details.

MEMBERSHIP_MISSING.title: Membership card missing
MEMBERSHIP_MISSING.description: To participate in a Furizon event, you need a membership card. Membership cards expire on the 30th of September.

ORDER_MULTIPLE_DONE.title: Multiple orders
ORDER_MULTIPLE_DONE.description: You've placed multiple orders for one account. Please contact support in order to undo the situation.

ORDER_SECRET_NOT_MATCH.title: Order not valid
ORDER_SECRET_NOT_MATCH.description: Could not verify the authenticity of your order. Please contact support to fix this issue.

ORDER_ALREADY_OWNED_BY_SOMEBODY_ELSE.title: Shared order
ORDER_ALREADY_OWNED_BY_SOMEBODY_ELSE.description: Your order appears to be shared with more users. Please, contact support to rectify the situation.

new_name.label: New name
new_name.help: This name will be used site wise to identify your account

new_locale.label: Locale
new_locale.help: The flag will appear onto your badge

fursuit_image.label: Photo
fursuit_image.help: Must be a photo of your fursuit

what_to_upload.title: What to upload here?
what_to_upload.description: Any picture uploaded here will be printed on your personal badge and be used as a profile picture site-wise. Every upload is reviewed and can be reported and deleted by Furizon’s staff. Any form of explicit content is forbidden, including cub material and pup play.

confirm_deletion.title: Confirm deletion
confirm_deletion.description: Do you want to delete the current image?

confirm_fursuit_deletion.title: Delete {name}'s fursuit
confirm_fursuit_deletion.description: Do you want to delete {name}'s fursuit?

fursuit_badge.title: Wanna bring your suit to Furizon?
fursuit_badge.description: Be sure to check Bring to {eventName}, so that Furizon can organize the fursuit lounge. As of now, you are capable of bringing a total of {maxFursuits, plural, =1 {1 fursuit} other {# fursuits}}. To bring more than that amount, you can buy extra badges by clicking Edit reservation in the Booking tab.

errors.IMAGE_DIMENSION_TOO_BIG: The provided image is too big
errors.FURSUIT_BADGES_ENDED: You don't have any more prints available. Buy more by editing your order.
errors.FURSUIT_ALREADY_BROUGHT_TO_CURRENT_EVENT: You already marked this fursuit to be brought.
errors.FURSUIT_NOT_BROUGHT_TO_CURRENT_EVENT: You already marked this fursuit to not be brought.

room.title: Room

room_edit_deadline.title: Room editing deadline
room_edit_deadline.description: Be sure to edit your room before {lockDate}.

room_edit_deadline_end.title: Room editing locked
room_edit_deadline_end.description: Since {lockDate}, room editing is now locked.

accept_invite.title: Accept invite?
accept_invite.description: You will join room <room>{roomName}</room>, owned by {nickname}.

refuse_invite.title: Refuse invite?
refuse_invite.description: You will refuse to join <room>{roomName}</room>, owned by {nickname}.

confirm_delete.title: Delete your room
confirm_delete.description: Do you want to delete <room>{roomName}</room>? Confirmed guests will be notified.

confirm_invite_cancel.title: Revoke invite
confirm_invite_cancel.description: Do you want to revoke your invite to {guestName}? The user will be notified via email

confirm_kick.title: Kick guest
confirm_kick.description: Do you want to kick {guestName} from your room?

confirm_leave.title: Leave room
confirm_leave.description: Do you want to leave room <room>{roomName}</room>?

exchange_invite_sent.title: Invite sent
exchange_invite_sent.description: You will both be contacted via email to confirm the exchange.

errors.EXCHANGE_STILL_PENDING: An exchange request is still pending.

invite.label: Invite someone in your room
invite.help: You can only invite users with a paid order, except daily tickets

invite.header: You've been invited in {amount, plural, =1 {a room} other {# rooms}}.
invite.title: {nickname} invited you to room <room>{roomName}.</room>

room.no_room: You don't have a room, yet.
room.can_create: You bought a room, create it in order to personalize it.
room.room_number_left: {size, plural, =0 {Room full} =1 {One spot left} other {# spots left}}

order_flow.no_room_type: There are no more room tiers at the moment.

quota_warning.title: Availaility warning
quota_warning.description: Room availability may change while ordering a room, refresh in order to get the latest count of rooms left.

order_notice.title: Order warning
order_notice.description: By checking this, you acknowledge that the requested change to your order cannot be reversed automatically. Please contact support, in case you want to go back.

linking.title: Order linking
linking.description: Please wait while we link your order to your account...

errors.ORDER_MULTIPLE_DONE: You might have issued multiple orders

messages.confirm_terminate_all_sessions: Terminate all sessions? You will be disconnected from all your devices.
messages.confirm_terminate_session: Terminate selected session? Your account will be disconnected from that device.

errors.NO_DATA: No membership cards were found for the year selected.
errors.PERMISSION_NOT_FOUND: You don't have the permission to do that.

confirm_ban.title: Confirm ban
confirm_ban.description: The account will be logged out from all devices and won't be able to log in.

confirm_unban.title: Confirm unban
confirm_unban.description: The account will be allowed to log in.

errors.PERMISSION_NOT_FOUND: You don't have the permission to do that.

list.temporary: {count, plural, =1 {# temporary member} other {#  temporary members}}

temporary_member.label: Temporary
temporary_member.help: Will own this role for the duration of the current event.

messages.discard_changes: Any unsaved changes will be discarded.
messages.confirm_deletion: Delete role {roleName}? It will remove {members} members and {tempMembers} temporary members.
messages.add_role: First, enter the role internal name

duplicate_user.title: Duplicate member
duplicate_user.description: You cannot insert a member in a role more times

email_success.title: Account recovery
email_success.description: An email is being sent to recover your account.

new_password.label: New password
new_password.help: Password must be at least 6 characters long

errors.pw_chage_same_password: The password matches the old one

room.received: <source></source> wants to exchange his room with you.

order.received: <source></source> wants to transfer his order to you.
order.sent: You requested to transfer your order to <target></target>.

errors.confirmation_still_pending: Confirm your email before logging in

register_success.title: Registration success
register_success.description: Check your email to confirm your account.

CONFIRMATION_SUCCESSFUL.title: Registration confirmed
CONFIRMATION_SUCCESSFUL.description: Email has been verified, you may now log in.

CONFIRMATION_NOT_FOUND.title: Code not found
CONFIRMATION_NOT_FOUND.description: Code is not valid or expired.

errors.email_already_registered: This email has already been used

birth_region.label: Birth region
birth_region.placeholder: Enter the region you were born in

confirm_password.help: Must be the same as the password
confirm_password.label: Confirm password

nickname.help: Won't be used for log in
nickname.label: Nickname

password.help: Must be at least 6 characters long
password.label: Password

residence_city.label: City
residence_city.placeholder: Enter the city you're living in

disclaimer_tos.label: By checking this box, you declare to be an adult and accept the convention's <terms>terms and conditions</terms>.

disclaimer_data_protection.label: By checking this box, you declare you've read and accepted the privacy policy.

question.description: Italy's laws make this data necessary to perform any sort of purchase and membership subscription. Be sure to check the privacy policy.
question.description_title: Why are you asking this data?

sections.sponsors: A big thanks to our sponsors ❤️
sections.nosecount: Who's coming to furizon? Let's find out in the nosecount!
